title: FS: T206 Polar Bear Nap Lajoie SGC 2.5
author: robw1959

posts.post_title: FS: T206 Polar Bear Nap Lajoie SGC 2.5
posts.post_content:
Definitely undergraded, even by today's grading standards. No creases, stains, or paper loss. Very clean front and back, especially for a Polar Bear issue. Asking net $1250 shipped, PayPal preferred.
